text:
Hi everyone, I’m facing issue with HubSpot message inbox.
When I’m sending messages from Inbox, I’m not receiving any webhook from HubSpot. It was working till last night but now it’s not working for any HubSpot app.
<@U04B32JHTUZ> <@U07LB3YLSRG>, can you please check on this, it’s critical issue for us.
cc: <@U08AG31EML0>
